testcase.name: Purchasing a product and verifying totals for Play Gym & Block Set
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the login page.......................................passed And User logs in with credentials as "yaso.kardes@gmail.com" and "Merlin8589".passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed Given User navigates to Block Set...........................................passed Then Adds block set to Cart.................................................passed And Navigates to Play Gym...................................................passed Then Adds play gym to Cart..................................................passed Then Continue to checkout...................................................passed And Fills up credidentials and continues to shipping........................passed And Selects shipping option and continues to payment........................passed And Fills up payment information and continues with Pay Now.................passed Then Verify totals for Play Gym & Block Set as "$244.38"....................passed

testcase.classname: Purchasing and Verify multiple items with Next Day Shipping.
testcase.name: Adding an extra Play gym then remove to purchase one Play Gym and one Block Set with Next Day Shipping.
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the login page.......................................passed And User logs in with credentials as "yaso.kardes@gmail.com" and "Merlin8589".passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed Given User navigates to Block Set...........................................passed And Increases Block Set to Two Block Set....................................passed Then Adds block set to Cart.................................................passed And Navigates to Play Gym...................................................passed Then Adds play gym to Cart..................................................passed And Removes One Block Set from cart.........................................passed Then Continue to checkout...................................................passed And Fills up credidentials and continues to shipping........................passed And Selects premium shipping option and continues to payment................passed And Fills up payment information and continues with Pay Now.................passed Then Verify totals for Play Gym & Block Set as "$261.32"....................passed
